div.div:
Great app but music disturbs I just wish music and voice could be separately muted. After one hour music is driving me insane and it also disturbs the voice so i can't hear pronunciation. But without audio the app is not useful. Please make separate mute button for music and voice and that is 5 stars. Thanks for otherwise great app!
Full Review

body.div: September 3, 2014 Thanks for trying Kiddie Doodles. Your suggestion makes sense, we will update this as soon as possible.

div.div:
Most Useful ! We are non-Malayali parents but our preschool daughter is having Malayalam language in school...this app is actually her teacher at home. Thanks a million for this app !

div.div:
Good initiative Please give an option in the settings to mute the background music only. The current mute settings disables the whole sound in application , and it affects the user experience while practicing the alphabet writing . A good initiative to spread Malayalam Language and I appreciate your efforts.Looking for more innovative stuffs from this team.
Full Review

body.div: November 3, 2013 Thanks for trying Kiddie Doodles Malayalam. We will try working on the mute option you specified. Thanks for the support
